## Defining research impact.

Googling the term: "Impact in research"

-   "Research impact is the effect research has beyond academia" [(University of York)](https://www.york.ac.uk/staff/research/research-impact/impact-definition/#:~:text=Research%20impact%20is%20the%20effect,our%20environment%20and%20the%20economy%E2%80%9D.)
-   "Shifts in understanding" ([UKRI](https://www.ukri.org/councils/esrc/impact-toolkit-for-economic-and-social-sciences/defining-impact/))
-   "impact is defined as an effect on, change or benefit to the economy, society, culture, public policy or services, health, the environment or quality of life, beyond academia" ([Leeds](https://researchersupport.leeds.ac.uk/research-impact-resource/research-impact/))
